11#include "vpx_config.h"
12#include "vp8_rtcd.h"
13#if VPX_ARCH_ARM
14#include "vpx_ports/arm.h"
15#elif VPX_ARCH_X86 || VPX_ARCH_X86_64
16#include "vpx_ports/x86.h"
17#elif VPX_ARCH_PPC
18#include "vpx_ports/ppc.h"
19#elif VPX_ARCH_MIPS
20#include "vpx_ports/mips.h"
21#endif
22#include "vp8/common/onyxc_int.h"
23#include "vp8/common/systemdependent.h"
24
25#if CONFIG_MULTITHREAD
26#if HAVE_UNISTD_H && !defined(__OS2__)
27#include <unistd.h>
28#elif defined(_WIN32)
29#include <windows.h>
30typedef void(WINAPI *PGNSI)(LPSYSTEM_INFO);
31#elif defined(__OS2__)
32#define INCL_DOS
33#define INCL_DOSSPINLOCK
34#include <os2.h>
35#endif
36#endif
37
38#if CONFIG_MULTITHREAD
39static int get_cpu_count() {
40 int core_count = 16;
41
42#if HAVE_UNISTD_H && !defined(__OS2__)
43#if defined(_SC_NPROCESSORS_ONLN)
44 core_count = (int)sysconf(_SC_NPROCESSORS_ONLN);
45#elif defined(_SC_NPROC_ONLN)
46 core_count = (int)sysconf(_SC_NPROC_ONLN);
47#endif
48#elif defined(_WIN32)
49 {
50#if _WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0501
51 SYSTEM_INFO sysinfo;
52 GetNativeSystemInfo(&sysinfo);
53#else
54 PGNSI pGNSI;
55 SYSTEM_INFO sysinfo;
56
57 /* Call GetNativeSystemInfo if supported or
58 * GetSystemInfo otherwise. */
59
60 pGNSI = (PGNSI)GetProcAddress(GetModuleHandle(TEXT("kernel32.dll")),
61 "GetNativeSystemInfo");
62 if (pGNSI != NULL)
63 pGNSI(&sysinfo);
64 else
65 GetSystemInfo(&sysinfo);
66#endif
67
68 core_count = (int)sysinfo.dwNumberOfProcessors;
69 }
70#elif defined(__OS2__)
71 {
72 ULONG proc_id;
73 ULONG status;
74
75 core_count = 0;
76 for (proc_id = 1;; ++proc_id) {
77 if (DosGetProcessorStatus(proc_id, &status)) break;
78
79 if (status == PROC_ONLINE) core_count++;
80 }
81 }
82#else
83/* other platforms */
84#endif
85
86 return core_count > 0 ? core_count : 1;
87}
88#endif
89
90void vp8_machine_specific_config(VP8_COMMON *ctx) {
91#if CONFIG_MULTITHREAD
92 ctx->processor_core_count = get_cpu_count();
93#endif /* CONFIG_MULTITHREAD */
94
95#if VPX_ARCH_ARM
96 ctx->cpu_caps = arm_cpu_caps();
97#elif VPX_ARCH_X86 || VPX_ARCH_X86_64
98 ctx->cpu_caps = x86_simd_caps();
99#elif VPX_ARCH_PPC
100 ctx->cpu_caps = ppc_simd_caps();
101#elif VPX_ARCH_MIPS
102 ctx->cpu_caps = mips_cpu_caps();
103#else
104 // generic-gnu targets.
105 ctx->cpu_caps = 0;
106#endif
107}
